name: save me (kisilin)
description:
My name is Eyna, I am the magical spirit of the world and I need your help!

For some time now, I have been assaulted by strange electrical spirits.
I have been pushing them away but now my strength is dwindling.

You are my last hope, would you please help me?

Source and credits for game art and sound: opengameart.org

Graphics: varkalandar, cethiel

Sounds: Tausdei, spookymodem, The Berklee College of Music,  Kim Lightyear, Blender Foundation, jalastram, OptimusDu
